divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog today. Then my dog wouldn't stop barking for about 15 minutes. Her face was facing upwards so I decided to see what was wrong. All of a sudden, I saw these 8 yellow triangular lights above me. A feeling of fear overcame me. As they got closer, I ran for my life.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around May 21st 2011
